projects.name: Plant Species and Growth analysis
projects.description: The Project deals with the images of the leaves of different plants. The Leaves are categorized into different growth phases. These phases are tagged with the images and their corresponding species names. These images are fed to machine learning algorithm which performs a voting type of classification among prominent algorithms and predicts the species name and the growth phase.

projects.name: Text Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Audio and Text based Sentiment Analysis using Reddit data and Twitter data categorized into 3 sets positive, negative and neutral
projects.techStack: Python, Machine Learning, Natural Lang Processing (NLP), Tkinter

projects.name: Rental Data Manager
projects.description: A stand alone application using Java Swing and sqlite database support which helps in managing the Rental data of a landlord about rooms availability, payments, power bills, etc.,. This helps in managing the finance generated and expenses. This can be used as a ledger for all the data to be stored systematically. Automatic quote generation and emailing to the tenants is also to be added.
